PreceptDef.label: arranged
PreceptDef.description:
Marriage can only be decided by the whole society.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - Pawns with this precept will not propose or accept it naturally. 
 - You can control marriage proposal in right-click menu.

PreceptDef.label: forbidden
PreceptDef.description:
Marriage is the tomb of love.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - Pawns with this precept will not propose or accept it naturally.

PreceptDef.label: flash marriage
PreceptDef.description:
If that thy bent of love be honourable, thy purpose marriage, send me word tomorrow.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - (Initiator)Marriage proposal chance +50% 
 - (Recipient)Marriage proposal acceptance chance +50%.

PreceptDef.label: late marriage
PreceptDef.description:
I am still waiting for the unique soul in the world.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 -(Initiator)Marriage proposal chance -50% 
 - (Recipient)Marriage proposal acceptance chance -50%.
